text: jannatavaale aagavaalon ko pukaarenge, "hamase hamaare rab ne jo vaada kiya tha, use hamane sach paaya. to kya tumase tumhaare rab ne jo vaada kar rakha tha, tumane bhee use sach paaya?" ve kahenge, "haan." itane mein ek pukaaranevaala unake beech pukaarega, "allaah kee phitakaar hai atyaachaariyon par.
